articles.title: Amazon Prime Video now allows Indian users to watch shows together through Watch Party feature - India Today
articles.description: Amazon Prime Video has brought in the Watch Party feature for Indian users. The feature allows up to 100 participants to watch shows or movies together on separate devices. The feature only works on a computer or web browser and not the mobile app as of now.
articles.content: Streaming giant Amazon Prime Video has extended its Watch Party extension to Indian users. Now, multiple users can stream their favourite shows from their homes and watch shows in sync. All they need… [+2262 chars]
